rules_text: Whenever Soli Arbalist or a nontoken Angel or Nephilim you control enters, amass Soldiers 2. If it was an Angel, amass Soldiers 4 instead. [i](To amass Soldiers {2}, put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Soldier. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Soldier Army creature token first.)[/i]
